name: Fujitsu P-Line P2711 TS QHD, 27"

raw_specifications.Besonderheiten: Eco-Mode, Overdrive-Technologie, Auto Brightness Control, ECO-Taste, DisplayView, Advanced Contrast Ratio (ACR), Low Blue Light Mode, Auto Pivot, Workplace Lighting Guide, 24/7 Betriebsmodus, Black Level, DICOM Compliant, Delta E=2-Farbgenauigkeit
